Description: 2017 Charvel Joe Duplantier Pro mod in Satin White finish. Awesome guitar and a must for the Gojira fan. The guitar is in excellent condition. Ebony fingerboard, locking tuners etc...It's a whole lot of quality guitar for the money. A new Charvel premium gig bag included! Thanks.
